Cupertino.KFJC: KFJC (89.7 FM) is a non-commercial college radio station in Los Altos Hills, California at Foothill College, using a Variety radio format that features a broad spectrum of music styles and public affairs programming. KFJC's over-the-air broadcast is 24/7 and can be heard within the southern San Francisco Bay Area. The broadcast is also streamed over Internet radio.
